channel.title: Need Help: npcs in part 001 and part 002 don't speak/ play their sound files
channel.description: when I starting playing the 2 parts, no npc's could speak. My sound is fine, i reinstalled my drivers and downgraded but no luck. Their mouths weren't moving that I could see and no voice files were playing. Need help :!: :!: :!: . The weapon sounds are fine and can be heard, It's just NPC's and monsters that won't play their sounds, from what i know of.

item.title: Need Help: npcs in part 001 and part 002 don't speak/ play their sound files
item.dc:creator: Hydra
item.description:
when I starting playing the 2 parts, no npc’s could speak. My sound is fine, i reinstalled my drivers and downgraded but no luck. Their mouths weren’t moving that I could see and no voice files were playing. Need help :!: :!: :!: . The weapon sounds are fine and can be heard, It’s just NPC’s and monsters that won’t play their sounds, from what i know of.
